Package com.lmax.solana4j.api

Interface MessageVisitor.MessageView

All Known Subinterfaces:
MessageVisitor.LegacyMessageView, MessageVisitor.Version0MessageView
Enclosing interface:
MessageVisitor<T>
public static interface MessageVisitor.MessageView
Interface representing a view of a message in the Solana blockchain.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MessageVisitor.AccountsView
    accounts()
    Returns the accounts view of the message.
    int
    countAccountsSigned()
    Returns the count of signed accounts in the message.

    Returns the count of read-only signed accounts in the message.

    Returns the count of read-only unsigned accounts in the message.

    Returns the public key of the fee payer for the transaction.

  • Method Details

    • countAccountsSigned

      int countAccountsSigned()
      Returns the count of signed accounts in the message.
      Returns:
      the number of signed accounts

    • countAccountsSignedReadOnly

      int countAccountsSignedReadOnly()
      Returns the count of read-only signed accounts in the message.
      Returns:
      the number of read-only signed accounts

    • countAccountsUnsignedReadOnly

      int countAccountsUnsignedReadOnly()
      Returns the count of read-only unsigned accounts in the message.
      Returns:
      the number of read-only unsigned accounts

    • accounts

      MessageVisitor.AccountsView accounts()
      Returns the accounts view of the message.
      Returns:
      the MessageVisitor.AccountsView of the message

    • transaction

      ByteBuffer transaction()
      Returns the transaction data as a byte buffer.

      The buffer's position will be set to 0, its limit will be set to its capacity, and its capacity will be the size of the transaction in bytes.

      Returns:
      the transaction data as a ByteBuffer

    • signature

      ByteBuffer signature(PublicKey account)
      Returns the signature for the given account as a byte buffer.

      The buffer's position will be set to 0, its limit will be set to its capacity, and its capacity will be the size of the signature in bytes.

      Parameters:
      account - the account used to sign the transaction
      Returns:
      the signature as a ByteBuffer

    • feePayer

      PublicKey feePayer()
      Returns the public key of the fee payer for the transaction.
      Returns:
      the PublicKey of the fee payer

    • recentBlockHash

      Blockhash recentBlockHash()
      Returns the recent blockhash for the transaction.
      Returns:
      the Blockhash of the recent blockhash

    • instructions

      List<MessageVisitor.InstructionView> instructions()
      Returns the list of instructions in the message.
      Returns:
      a list of MessageVisitor.InstructionView objects representing the instructions

    • isSigner

      boolean isSigner(PublicKey account)
      Checks if the given account is a signer.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to check
      Returns:
      true if the account is a signer, false otherwise

    • isWriter

      boolean isWriter(PublicKey account)
      Checks if the given account is a writer.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to check
      Returns:
      true if the account is a writer, false otherwise

    • signers

      List<PublicKey> signers()
      Returns the list of signer public keys for the transaction.
      Returns:
      a list of PublicKey objects representing the signers
